kv9.6:5.5: Hañci atītārammaṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:5.8: Hañci vā pana anārammaṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:6.3: Nanu atītaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhīti?
kv9.6:6.7: Hañci atītaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:7.5: Hañci anāgatārammaṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:7.8: Hañci vā pana anārammaṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:8.3: Nanu anāgataṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhīti?
kv9.6:8.7: Hañci anāgataṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv9.6:9.1: Paccuppannaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ sārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:9.5: Atītaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhi, atītārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ sārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:9.10: paccuppannaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ sārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:9.14: Anāgataṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhi, anāgatārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ sārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:10.1: Atītaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhi, atītārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ anārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:10.5: Paccuppannaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ anārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:11.1: Anāgataṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhi, anāgatārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ anārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:11.5: Paccuppannaṃ ārabbha atthi āvaṭṭanā … pe … paṇidhi, paccuppannārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ anārammaṇanti?
kv9.6:12.6: Hañci atītānāgataṃ natthi, tena vata re vattabbe—
